product_name: CamelBak Aventura 18 Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz. - Women's
long_description: Perfect for hiking, the women's CamelBak Aventura 18 Hydration Pack maximizes comfort and ventilation. It packs everything you need for a done-in-a-day expedition. Entire pack is tailored to fit women comfortably, including a shorter torso length and an S-shape harness with adjustment hardware moved away from the chest. Ventilated NV(TM) back panel keeps you cool and comfortable via its articulated suspension; individual pods move in sync with you while keeping the pack's contents balanced. 100 fl. oz. Antidote#8482; reservoir features a welded center baffle and low-profile shape for stability. Quick Link#8482; system lets you effortlessly add accessories such as a filter, insulated tube, tube director or flow meter (accessories sold separately). Folding arms lock into position to hold the reservoir open when drying; arms tuck out of the way around the port when not in use. Wide-mouth port makes it easy to fill and clean the reservoir; quick-snap cap tightens in just a quarter turn. Patented Big Bite#8482; valve; HydroGuard#8482; technology; PureFlow#8482; tube. Hydration compartment loads easily, holding the reservoir flat against your back to leave more room for layers and gear. Large main compartment, overflow pocket, front organizational pocket and 2 stretch side pockets organize your gear and keep essentials quickly accessible. Easy-access, fleece-lined pocket holds your sunglasses, smartphone or other valuables. The CamelBak Aventura 18 Hydration Pack features 4-point compression that helps stabilize your cargo.
short_description: Perfect for hiking, the women's CamelBak Aventura 18 Hydration Pack maximizes comfort and ventilation. It packs everything you need for a done-in-a-day expedition.
